text: Whenever ideas fail, men invent words.
author: Martin H. Fischer

text: No nice men are good at getting taxis.
author: Katharine Whitehorn

text: Men are often biased in their judgment on account of their sympathy and their interests.
author: George William Norris

text: For most men life is a search for the proper manila envelope in which to get themselves filed.
author: Clifton Paul Fadiman

text: That common cold of the male psyche, fear of commitment.
author: Richard Schickel
